Text: Can someone kindly describe what's in this episode? Thank you very much.

Wikipedia gives:
Nature Season Twenty-Six, as No 7: "Crash: A Tale of" (Red Knot and Limulidae) Two Species" (February 2, 2008)
Red Knot is a bird which eats the eggs of the horseshoe crab (whose scientific name is given in the title).
You'll have to hunt for this file elsewhere now...
